sentences.en: A dive that begins from a handstand position, used only in platform diving.
sentences.cn: 运动员以手倒立的姿势开始跳水动作, 只用在跳台跳水中.

sentences.en: A five-minute handstand is one of the hardships that teaches martial arts novices to "eat bitterness." Teachers emphasize character, kung fu, and academics, with a little free time for basketball.
sentences.cn: 五分钟的手倒立是教练要求初学者必做的“吃苦”项目之一，教练会在篮球活动的间隙强调品行、功夫和教学之间的联系。

sentences.en: A patient of the psychosis, wear in hospital handstand on foot.
sentences.cn: 一位精神不正常的病人, 在医院倒立着走路.

sentences.en: Arm stand dive: A dive that begins from a handstand position, used only in platform diving.
sentences.cn: 臂立跳水: 跳水动作由臂立姿势起始.只在跳台跳水中使用.

sentences.en: Avoid doing handstand on female physiological actions, not on the Pilates class.
sentences.cn: 女性生理期忌做倒立动作, 不宜上普拉提课.

sentences.en: Can long handstand affect vision? How to prevent?
sentences.cn: 长久倒立会影响视力 吗 ?如何预防?

sentences.en: I caught her ankles as she kicked into a handstand.
sentences.cn: 她倒立踢腾腿时，我抓稳她的脚踝。

sentences.en: I stand on my front feet and do handstand to warn my enemies.
sentences.cn: 当我警告敌人时,会立起前足倒立.

sentences.en: Korea Republic is bold and unconstrained cattle ^ s handstand dances most on daughter performance history!
sentences.cn: 韩国豪放女表演史上最牛的倒立舞!

sentences.en: Liz: Wow! He did a handstand reverse twist. Nice!
sentences.cn: 丽兹: 哇! 他做了一组倒立反身转体. 赞!

sentences.en: Mom said that when she was young, every child could do a handstand.
sentences.cn: 小孩子哭闹着就是不吃药,我只好把药切成碎末儿 、 冲成水剂喂他.

sentences.en: The handstand group gives up the contest because of the training fatigue.
sentences.cn: 倒立组却因为厌倦而放弃比赛.

sentences.en: The iron croos and the handstand both require great strength.
sentences.cn: 字支撑和手倒立需要极大的力量.

sentences.en: The iron cross and the handstand both require great strength.
sentences.cn: 十字支撑和手倒立需要极大的力量.

sentences.en: There are four set exercises for women: floor exercises, vault, balance beam and handstand.
sentences.cn: 女子体操有四个项目的规定动作: 自由体操 、 跳马 、 平衡木和手倒立.

sentences.en: When I was just about nine or ten years old, I could hold a headstand for five minutes, and I could kick up against the wall and go into a handstand.
sentences.cn: 在九岁左右，我就能够头触地倒立五分钟，还能够借助墙壁完全用手倒立。

sentences.en: With that, she flipped into a handstand and looked at Kevin with an upside down grin.
sentences.cn: 说着话, 她翻了个倒立,头朝下对着凯文嗤笑.

trans.tran_en: a movement in which you put your hands on the ground and your legs in the air
